function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cognitive overload leading to decreased social trust and careless decisions","Impact":"Reduced social trust and increased likelihood of careless decisions","Mitigation":"Provide training on information processing, limit exposure to overwhelming information, and promote mindfulness practices","Technologies":"AI algorithms for filtering and categorizing information, information management software","People":"Individuals experiencing cognitive overload","Owner":"Employers, educators, and mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Decline in human trust in journalistic content","Impact":"Increased spread of misinformation and fake news, decreased credibility of journalistic sources","Mitigation":"Improving transparency in journalism, promoting media literacy, fact-checking initiatives","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, transparency and credibility assessment software","People":"Consumers of news and information","Owner":"Journalistic organizations, media literacy educators, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in sharing of unverified COVID-19 information due to online information trust","Impact":"Spread of misinformation and potential public health risks","Mitigation":"Promote critical evaluation of online information, educate on reliable sources for health information, fact-checking of COVID-19 news","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, reliable health information databases","People":"Social media users, individuals seeking COVID-19 information","Owner":"Social media platforms, public health organizations"}]}
